Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of lost time injuries per million hours worked.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Lost Time Injuries / Total Hours Worked) * 1,000,000

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of recordable injuries per 100 full-time employees.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Recordable Injuries / Total Hours Worked) * 200,000

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of employees who complete OHS training programs.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Who Completed OHS Training / Total Number of Employees Required to Complete OHS Training) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the frequency of near-miss incidents reported.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Near-Miss Incidents Reported / Total Number of Employees) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of OHS audits that result in a pass.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Passed OHS Audits / Total OHS Audits Conducted) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: The total number of OHS incidents reported.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Count of OHS Incidents Reported

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the results of OHS compliance inspections.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Rating of OHS Compliance Inspections

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of employees participating in OHS programs.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Participating in OHS Programs / Total Number of Employees) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the reduction in energy consumption over time.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Previous Energy Consumption - Current Energy Consumption) / Previous Energy Consumption * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of waste that is recycled.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Amount of Waste Recycled / Total Amount of Waste Generated) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the reduction in greenhouse gas emissions.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Previous Greenhouse Gas Emissions - Current Greenhouse Gas Emissions) / Previous Greenhouse Gas Emissions * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures improvements in water usage efficiency.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Previous Water Usage Efficiency - Current Water Usage Efficiency) / Previous Water Usage Efficiency * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: The percentage of environmental compliance audits that pass.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Passed Environmental Compliance Audits / Total Environmental Compliance Audits) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of environmental impact assessments completed.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Environmental Impact Assessments / Total Required Environmental Impact Assessments) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.KPIS: Number of environmental improvement projects implemented
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of environmental improvement projects that are put into action.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Count of Environmental Improvement Projects Implemented

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of achieved environmental sustainability certifications.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Sustainability Certifications Obtained / Total Number of Certification Applications) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of employees who complete safety training.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Who Completed Safety Training / Total Number of Employees Required to Complete Safety Training) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures how well employees retain knowledge from training.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Post-Training Knowledge Test Score - Pre-Training Knowledge Test Score) / Pre-Training Knowledge Test Score * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of safety training programs based on evaluations.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Rating of Safety Training Evaluation

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.KPIS: Time to complete safety training programs
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the average duration to complete safety training programs.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Time to Complete All Safety Training Programs / Number of Employees Trained

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.KPIS: Number of safety training sessions conducted
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: The total number of safety training sessions held.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Count of Safety Training Sessions Conducted

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures adherence to required safety training standards.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Meeting Safety Training Requirements / Total Number of Employees Required to Meet Requirements) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the level of employee engagement in safety training programs.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Employee Engagement Score for Safety Training Programs

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the reduction in incident rates following safety training.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Incident Rate Before Training - Incident Rate After Training) / Incident Rate Before Training * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the time taken to respond to incidents.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Incidents / Number of Incidents

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of incidents that are resolved.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Incidents Resolved / Total Number of Incidents) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: The total number of incidents that are escalated to higher levels.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Count of Incidents Escalated

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures how well incident response procedures work.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Rating of Incident Response Procedures Effectiveness

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures customer satisfaction with the resolution of incidents.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Incident Resolution

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to close incidents.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Time to Close Incidents / Number of Incidents

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of incident reports.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Incident Reports / Total Number of Incident Reports) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the frequency of recurring incidents.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Recurring Incidents / Total Number of Incidents) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the total number of risks identified during risk assessments.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Count of Risks Identified

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the severity of risks based on impact and likelihood.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Risk Severity Rating Based on Risk Assessments

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures how effective risk mitigation strategies are.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Effective Risk Mitigations / Total Number of Risk Mitigations) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of completed risk assessments.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Risk Assessments / Total Number of Risk Assessments Required) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of risk assessments.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Risk Assessments / Total Number of Risk Assessments) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures how often the risk register is reviewed and updated.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Number of Updates to Risk Register / Time Period (e.g., Monthly, Quarterly)

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the impact of risks on business operations.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Rating of Risk Impact on Business Operations

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of identified risks that are accepted rather than mitigated.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Accepted Risks / Total Number of Identified Risks) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the time taken to initiate a response to an emergency.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Emergencies / Number of Emergencies

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of completed emergency preparedness drills.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Emergency Preparedness Drills / Total Number of Planned Drills) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of the emergency response plan.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Emergency Responses / Total Number of Emergency Drills or Incidents) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of employees participating in emergency drills.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Participating in Emergency Drills / Total Number of Employees) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the reliability of the emergency communication system.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Communications / Total Number of Communication Attempts) * 100

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to complete emergency evacuations.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Total Time to Complete Emergency Evacuation / Number of Evacuation Drills

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of coordination with emergency responders.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Average Rating of Coordination with Emergency Responders

Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of lessons identified from emergency simulations.
Corporate+Environmental Health and Safet.FORMULA: Number of Lessons Learned from Simulations / Total Number of Simulations
